product_name: Sea to Summit Big River Dry Bag - 20 Liters
long_description: Whether on land or water, keep your gear dry and functioning with the Sea to Summit Big River dry bag. Fully taped seams and a Hypalon(TM) roll-top closure provide reliable waterproof performance. 420 denier nylon coated with a tough thermoplastic urethane makes the Sea to Summit Big River 20-liter dry bag a lightweight yet durable choice. Oval base resists rolling and stays where you put it. Durable attachment points secure sack to a pack or kayak. Comes in assorted colors only; sorry, specific color requests cannot be accommodated.
short_description: Whether on land or water, keep your gear dry and functioning with the Sea to Summit Big River dry bag.
